name: Cursed Bees
description:
FLV Cured tobacco (Strong tobacco notes) and FLV Honey Bee (this is a floral honey with notes of real honey, straight from the bees) are made for each other, even so, I pushed the limit with the cured tobacco, the FA Vanilla Bourbon (excellent gourmet vanilla flavor) fuses the above aromas by giving a smooth and creamy touch.

A simple not overly sweet but bold tobacco vape with character. 
A tribute to the Bees...

Steep, as usual with tobaccos I prefer to start vaping after a day or 20.
author: besejuiced
